heading: Feature-packed yet simple air conditioning.
subheading: High efficiency, heating down to -25 °C, and integrated Wi-Fi for convenient control from your smartphone. Smart ensures clean, pleasant air and maximum comfort with an unbeatable price-to-performance ratio.
why_info_item_1_description: It won’t let you down even on the coldest days. This powerful system ensures comfort and warmth in every season. Efficient heating with minimal energy costs.
why_info_item_2_description: UVC light completely eliminates all bacteria and viruses, while the ionizer removes dust, allergens, and other impurities. The combination of these innovations in Naitec Smart air conditioners creates a healthier and safer environment in your home.
why_info_item_3_description: Wi-Fi control allows easy adjustment of temperature, modes, and other functions via your smartphone or tablet anytime, anywhere.
why_info_item_4_description: With a noise level of just 22 decibels, it is one of the quietest air conditioners on the market. You can enjoy peaceful summer evenings in a comfortable environment at home.
why_info_item_5_description: The high energy efficiency of R32 refrigerant ensures more effective cooling and heating, significantly reducing the environmental impact. It is the ideal choice for a more sustainable future.
all_you_need_item_1_description: Naitec Smart automatically cleans its internal evaporator through sterilization, ensuring your air is always fresh and free from bacteria and viruses.
all_you_need_item_1_long_description: When the 'sterilization' function is activated, the evaporator in the indoor unit first freezes and then heats up to 57 °C, which, combined with the UVC lamp and ionizer, ensures internal unit purification and the elimination of harmful bacteria. This technology provides a pleasant feeling of freshness and a healthy atmosphere without unnecessary negative effects.
all_you_need_item_2_title: Heating with air conditioning down to -25°C
all_you_need_item_2_description: The ability to efficiently heat down to -25 °C ensures a comfortable and pleasant environment even during colder winter days.
all_you_need_item_3_description: We value quality, which is why Naitec Onyx comes with a 3-year warranty, ensuring long-term reliability.
all_you_need_item_3_long_description: The extended warranty is valid only with regular servicing at least once a year by the supplier from whom you purchased the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_4_description: Optional voice controller Lisa for easy and convenient voice control of the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_5_description: In the app, you can set a performance limit for the air conditioner, allowing you to save up to 70% energy.
effective_heating_description_1: Naitec air conditioners are very efficient at heating.
effective_heating_description_2: It is so powerful that it can effortlessly heat down to -35°C. Efficient heating with minimal energy costs without the need for additional heat sources.
